Origin: 森の中で懐かしい匂いを感じると話すオルキスに、もしやその匂いの先に黒騎士が居るのではと判断した[ジータ]一行は、オルキスの先導で匂いの源へと進む。
Korean: 숲 속에서 그리운 냄새를 느낀다고 말하는 오르키스에 혹시 그 냄새 끝에 흑기사가 있지 않을까 판단한 [지타] 일행은 오르키스의 선도로 냄새의 원천으로 나아간다.

Name: オルキス
Origin:
くんくん……
くんくんくん……

Name: 루리아
Origin: どうしたの？ オルキスちゃん。

Name: オルキス
Origin: 匂い……匂いがする。

Name: 라캄
Origin:
匂い？ っても……森ン中だからなぁ。
花の匂いだの、木の匂いだのなら、
さっきからプンプンしてるぜ？

Name: オルキス
Origin:
どっちも違う……
なんて言うんだろ……
懐かしい……匂い。

Name: 이오
Origin: 懐かしい匂いってことは……

Name: 이오
Origin:
ねぇねぇ！
それって、黒騎士が
近くに居るってことなんじゃない！？

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
可能性はあるな……
オルキス、その匂いというのは
どちらからするんだ？
Korean:
가능성은 있네…
오르키스, 그 냄새는
어느 쪽에서 나는 거야?

Name: オルキス
Origin: あっち……

Name: 루리아
Origin:
その方向に
黒騎士さんが居るかもですね！
行ってみましょう！ [ジータ]！
オルキスの感覚を頼りに謎の遺跡にたどり着いた[ジータ]一行。しかし、そこに黒騎士の姿はなく、懐かしい匂いがするとオルキスが指さす先には謎のゴーレムが待ち受けていた。
Korean: 오르키스의 감각을 의지해 의문의 유적에 도착한 [지타]일행.그러나 흑기사의 모습은 없고 그리운 냄새가 나면 오르키스가 가리키는 끝에는 의문의 골렘이 기다리고 있었다.

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ここは……何かの遺跡か？
随分と朽ちているようだが。
Korean:
여기는……무슨 유적인가?
꽤 썩은 것 같은데?

Name: 이오
Origin:
こんなところに黒騎士が居るの？
なにやってんのかしら？ あいつ。

Name: オルキス
Origin:
なにを……言ってるの？
アポロは、ここにはいない。
……と、思う。
Korean:
뭘... 말하는 거야?
아폴로는, 여기에 없다.
…라고 생각한다.

Name: 이오
Origin:
アポロ？
って、えっと……？

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
黒騎士の奴はここにはいねぇってか。
ってぇなると、
嬢ちゃんの感じた匂いってのは……
Korean:
흑기사놈은 여기 없다니?
라고 하면,
아가씨가 느낀 냄새란 것은……

Name: オルキス
Origin:
私と同じ匂い……
覚えてないけど懐かしくなる、
そんな匂いが……そこから。
Korean:
나와 같은 냄새....
기억나지 않지만 그리워진다.
그런 냄새가....거기로부터.

Name: 비이
Origin:
ゴーレム！？
なんでこんなところに！？

Name: 비이
Origin:
ゴーレムって言やぁ、
財宝を守るのが仕事のハズだぜ！？
Korean:
골렘이라고나 할까,
재보를 지키는 것이 일의 비밀이야!?

Name: 로제타
Origin:
ふふふ……
ゴーレムが守るのは、
なにも金銀財宝だけじゃないわよ？

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
どうやら私達は、
ゴーレムにとって
歓迎すべき客ではないようだ……
Korean:
아무래도 우리들은,
골렘에게 있어서
환영해야할 손님은 아닌것 같다……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
[ジータ]！
こうなっては仕方がない……
応戦するぞ！
オルキスの話す懐かしい匂いとは黒騎士のものではなく、黒騎士を見つけるための手がかりを失う[ジータ]一行。力になれず落ち込むオルキスを元気づけながらも、辺りの探索を始める。
Korean: 오르키스가 말하는 그리운 냄새란 흑기사의 것이 아니라 흑기사를 찾기 위한 단서를 잃는 [지타] 일행. 힘이 되지 못하고 침울해지는 오르키스에 기운을 북돋우면서도 주변의 탐색을 시작한다.

Name: オルキス
Origin:
――ごめんなさい。
私が懐かしい匂いなんて言うから、
危ない目に……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ふふっ……なに、謝ることじゃないさ。
それに、その匂いのする方に
行こうと決めたのは私達だしな。
Korean:
후훗...뭐, 사과할 일이 아니야.
게다가 그 냄새나는 쪽으로
가자고 결정한 건 우리니까.

Name: 비이
Origin:
そうだぜ！
それに、あんなゴーレムくらい、
オイラ達の敵じゃねーしな！

Name: 라캄
Origin:
しかし、ゴーレムが護ってはいたが……
ここはいったい、
どういう場所なんだ？
Korean:
그러나, 골렘이 지키고는 있었지만……
여기는 도대체,
어떤 장소인가?

Name: 라캄
Origin:
この建物の跡からすりゃぁ
どこにでもある
教会の名残にしか見えねぇが……
Korean:
이 건물 뒤쪽으로 가면
어디에나 있는
교회의 자취로 밖에 보이지 않지만……

Name: 로제타
Origin:
もしかしたら、
ゴーレムと遺跡は
関係ないのかもしれないわよ？

Name: 로제타
Origin:
朽ちた後にここを訪れた魔術師が、
何かお宝でも隠して、
ゴーレムに護らせてたとか……
Korean:
썩은후에 이곳을 방문한 마술사가,
뭔가 보물이라도 숨겨서
골렘에게 지키게 했다던가……

Name: 이오
Origin:
ふふん？
面白そうじゃない！ その話！
Korean:
흥?
재밌을 것 같지 않아! 그 얘기!

Name: 비이
Origin:
お宝一番乗りは譲らねーぜ！
行こうぜ！ [ジータ]！
Korean:
보물 제일 먼저 타는 것은 양보하지 말자!
가자! [지타]!

Name: 이오
Origin:
あ！ ちょっとコラ！
待ちなさいよ！

Name: 로제타
Origin:
……ま、こんな場所に
お宝を隠すような魔術師は
居ないと思うけど……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ともかく、辺りを探索してみよう。
オルキス……それにルリアにも繋がる
何かが見つかるかもしれない。
Korean:
어쨌든 주변을 탐색해 보자.
오르키스…… 거기에 루리아에도 연결되는
무엇이 발견될지도 모른다.

Name: 루리아
Origin:
だよねっ！
探しに行こう、オルキスちゃん！

Name: オルキス
Origin:
ん……
[ジータ]も一緒に……

Name: 루리아
Origin:
ふふ……そうだね。
みんなで一緒に探しに行きましょう！
[ジータ]一行は遺跡を探索するも、めぼしいものを見つけることは出来なかった。指針を失った[ジータ]一行は唯一の手がかりであるオルキスを連れ、黒騎士の行方を追う。
Korean: [지타] 일행은 유적을 탐색하는 데에도 값진 것을 찾지 못했다.지침을 잃은 [지타] 일행은 유일한 단서인 오르키스를 데리고 흑기사의 행방을 쫓는다.

Name: 비이
Origin:
ぜぇはぁ……
き、気合入れて、
お宝探ししてみたものの……

Name: 이오
Origin:
なんにも……はぁ、はぁ……
ないじゃないのよぅ……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ははは……
まったく、はしゃぎ過ぎだぞ？

Name: オルキス
Origin:
ルリア……
ルリアは、なにか見つけた？

Name: 루리아
Origin:
んー……
私もなんにも……

Name: 루리아
Origin:
実を言うと、
オルキスちゃんの言う懐かしい匂い
っていうのもわかんなくて……
Korean:
사실대로 말하면,
오루키스가 말하는 그리운 냄새
라는 것도 모르고……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ということは、
ルリアとオルキスに共通する能力は
特に関係なく……
Korean:
그렇다는 것은,
루리아와 오르키스에 공통되는 능력은
특별히 관계없고……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
オルキス自身の故郷や出自から、
懐かしいと感じたのかもしれないな。
Korean:
오르키스 자신의 고향이나 출신으로부터,
그립다고 느꼈을지도 몰라.

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
そういや、オルキス嬢ちゃんは、
どこの出身なんだ？ ルーマシーか？
Korean:
그래아니, 오르키스 아가씨는
어디 출신이야? < span class = ' scene - font - place ' > ルーマ シー < / span > か ？

Name: オルキス
Origin:
わからない……
気が付いたら、アポロのところにいた。
Korean:
모르겠다……
정신을 차려 보니, 아폴로가 있는 곳에 있었다.

Name: オルキス
Origin:
だけど……ここじゃない。
なんとなくだけど……そんな気がする。

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
そういうことなら、
気の済むまで、
ブラついてみるとすっか……

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
魔物の相手をしながら、
森をうろうろしてりゃぁ、
そのうち黒騎士とも会えるだろうさ。
Korean:
마물을 상대하면서
숲을 서성이면
조만간 흑기사도 만날 수 있겠지.

Origin: ふとした瞬間に、ルリアはオルキスの姿が見えないことに気付く。森の中で迷子になったのではと[ジータ]一行はオルキスを探し始める。
Korean: 우연한 순간에 루리아는 오르키스의 모습이 보이지 않는 것을 알아차린다.숲 속에서 길을 잃지는 않았을까 하고 [지타] 일행은 오르키스를 찾기 시작한다.

Name: 루리아
Origin:
――あれ？
ねぇねぇ、[ジータ]
オルキスちゃん、見なかったですか？

Name: 비이
Origin:
ん？
なんだよ、オルキスの奴、
迷子になったのか？

Name: 루리아
Origin:
なのかなぁ……
さっきからオルキスちゃんの姿が……

Name: 이오
Origin:
森の中で迷子になっちゃうなんて、
とんだお子様ね！

Name: 라캄
Origin:
お前だってさっきから
ちょいちょい
迷子になりかけてただろうが……

Name: 이오
Origin:
ううう、うるっさいわね！
ほら！ そういうことなら、
さっさとあの子探しに行くわよ！
[ジータ]一行はオルキスを探すがなかなか見つからず、魔物に襲われたのではと不安がよぎる。そんな中ロゼッタはビィの過去を知っているようなことを漏らすが、すぐにはぐらかしてしまう。
Korean: [지타]일행은 오르키스를 찾지만 좀처럼 찾지 못하고, 마물에 휩쓸렸을까봐 불안하다.그런 가운데 로제타는 비의 과거를 알고 있는 듯한 말을 하지만, 곧 얼버무려 버린다.

Name: 루리아
Origin:
うーん……
見つからないなぁ、オルキスちゃん……

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
心配だな……
魔物に襲われたり
していなければいいが……

Name: 로제타
Origin:
魔物にやられるような
やわな子には見えなかったけど……
あまり独りにはしておきたくないわね。
Korean:
마물에게 당할것 같은
나긋나긋한 아이로는 보이지않았지만……
그다지 혼자 두고싶지는 않네.

Name: 비이
Origin:
なぁなぁ、
美味そうな料理でも作りゃ、
匂いに釣られて出てくんじゃねーか？
Korean:
야~
맛있을 것 같은 요리라도 해야,
냄새에 낚여나오지 않을까?

Name: 이오
Origin:
トカゲちゃんじゃないんだから、
それはないわよ……

Name: 비이
Origin: オイラはトカゲじゃねーっつの！

Name: 로제타
Origin: えっ……？

Name: 비이
Origin:
おいぃぃ！
なんだよその心底驚いた顔！

Name: 비이
Origin:
オイラのこの立派な羽根と爪を見ても、
なんとも思わなかったってのか！？
Korean:
오이라의 이 훌륭한 날개와 손톱을 보고도,
아무것도 생각하지 않았다는 건가!?

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
まるっとした羽根も、小さな爪も、
実に可愛らしいぞ、ビィくん。
Korean:
동글동글한 날개도, 작은 손톱도,
참으로 사랑스럽다, 비군.

Name: 비이
Origin:
だぁぁぁ！
可愛いって言うなぁー！
Korean:
으아아앗!
귀엽다고 말하는구나!

Name: 로제타
Origin:
……そ、そうね。
貴方は……トカゲじゃなかったわね。
そう……昔から、ね。

Name: 비이
Origin:
あたぼうよ！
オイラがトカゲだったことなんて、
生まれてこのかた一度も……

Name: 비이
Origin:
……ん？ 昔からって、ロゼッタ……
アンタもしかして、
過去にオイラに会ったことが……？

Name: 로제타
Origin:
さ、さぁ……どうかしらね？
どうだっていいじゃない、そんな話。

Name: 로제타
Origin:
そんなことより、ほら、
魔物のお出ましよ？
構えなさい、[ジータ]。

Name: 로제타
Origin:
オルキスちゃんの前に
アタシ達が魔物にやられちゃ
洒落にもならないんだから。
Korean:
오르키스 앞에
내가 마물에게 당하면
멋져지지도 않으니까.

Origin: オルキスを探す[ジータ]一行の前に、オルキスを連れた黒騎士が姿を現す。オルキスは[ジータ]達と共に居たいと告げるが、黒騎士に連れ去られてしまい、納得の出来ない[ジータ]一行は二人を追う。
Korean: 오르키스를 찾는 [지타] 일행 앞에 오르키스를 거느린 흑기사가 모습을 드러낸다.오르키스는 [지타]들과 함께 있고 싶다고 말하지만, 흑기사에게 끌려가는 바람에 납득이 가지 않는 [지타]

Name: 루리아
Origin:
オールーキースーちゃーん！
返事してー！

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
これだけ探しても見つからねぇたぁ……
いよいよ危ねぇかもしれねぇな。
Korean:
이것만 찾아도 찾을 수가 없어에-타-……
드디어 위험할지도 모르겠네.

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
ひとりでよろず屋に戻ったとか、
そういう話なら助かるんだが――
Korean:
혼자서 비틀거리며 돌아왔다든가,
그런 이야기라면 도움이 되겠지만-

Origin: ――それは少々、楽観的すぎるな。

Name: 라캄
Origin: 黒騎士っ！？

Name: 루리아
Origin:
オルキスちゃん！
黒騎士さんと一緒だったんだ。

Name: 루리아
Origin: オルキスちゃん……？

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
ロゼッタ……
貴様、いったいどういうつもりだ？

Name: 로제타
Origin:
どうもこうもないわ。
おねーさんは、可愛い子が大好きなの。
それだけよ？
Korean:
별로 이렇지도 않아.
언니는 이쁜아이를 정말 좋아해.
그것 뿐이야?

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
道化が……まぁ、いい。
人形が我が手に戻った以上、
今回は目を瞑るが……次はないぞ。
Korean:
우스운 행동'이……뭐, 좋다.
인형이 내 손으로 돌아온 이상,
이번에는 봐주지만……다음은 없다.

Name: 로제타
Origin:
ふふ、そう？
じゃ、気を付けようかしらね。

Name: 흑기사
Origin: ちっ……行くぞ、人形。

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
おい、何をしている……？
なんのまねだ？

Name: オルキス
Origin:
わ、私……
もう少しだけ……
ルリア達と一緒に居たい……
Korean:
와, 나……
조금만 더……
루리아들과 함께 있고 싶어……

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
……ロゼッタ、
貴様、これが目的か？
面倒なことをしてくれたな……！

Name: 로제타
Origin:
ふふ……
さぁ？ どうかしらね？

Name: 비이
Origin:
っていうか、やい！ 黒騎士！
さっきからオイラ達を、
無視してんじゃねーぞ！
Korean:
그건 그렇고, 야! 흑기사!
아까부터 오이라들을
무시하면 안 돼!

Name: 비이
Origin:
この群島に来いって言ってたけど、
ここ、森と木以外に
なんにもねーじゃねぇか！
Korean:
이 군도로 오라고 했는데,
여기 숲이랑 나무 말고
아무것도 아니잖아!

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
馬鹿が……
ならば、
貴様らはその程度ということだ。

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
行くぞ、人形。
もうここに用はない。

Name: オルキス
Origin:
あっ……
あぅ……ルリアっ……！

Name: 루리아
Origin: オルキスちゃんっ！

黒騎士はオルキスの手を引き、
[ジータ]達の前から
瞬く間に姿を消した。
Korean:
흑기사는 오루키스의 손을 당겨
[지타] 일행의 앞에서
순식간에 사라졌다.

Name: 루리아
Origin: オルキスちゃん……

Name: 비이
Origin:
なぁ！ [ジータ]！
まだ遅くねーよ！ 追いかけようぜ！
オイラこんなの納得できねぇ！
Korean:
야! [지타]!
아직 늦지 않았어! 뒤쫓아가자구!
오이라 이런거 납득할 수 없어!

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
ああ、騎空艇で来ていた以上、
まだルーマシー群島を出てはいまい……
追いかけるぞ！ [ジータ]！
Korean:
아아, 기공정으로 온 이상,
아직

Origin: 黒騎士に追いつく[ジータ]一行。しかし、黒騎士は自らにとって必要なのはルリアだけだと話し、[ジータ]一行に魔物をけしかけてくる。
Korean: 흑기사 따라잡기 [지타] 한 줄그러나 루리아뿐이라며 흑기사는 [지타]일행에게 마물을 걸어온다.

Name: 이오
Origin:
――見つけたわよ！ 黒騎士！
オルキス嫌がってるじゃない！
手、離しなさいよ！

Name: オルキス
Origin: イオ……

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
しつこい連中だ……
私が私の所有物をどう扱おうと、
貴様らに関係ないだろう。
Korean:
끈질긴 친구들이다……
내가 내 소유물을 어떻게 다루든,
네 놈들과는 상관없겠지.

Name: 이오
Origin:
馬鹿じゃないの！！
オルキスはもう
あたし達の友達なんだから！

Name: 이오
Origin:
だから……
だからそんな泣きそうな顔、
放っておけるわけないじゃない！！

Name: 라캄
Origin:
よく言った、イオ。
その通りだぜ。

Name: 라캄
Origin:
そういうわけだ。
このまますんなり
行かせてやるわけにゃいかねぇな。

Name: 흑기사
Origin: ……少々、甘くし過ぎていたようだな。

Name: 라캄
Origin: あん？ なんだって？

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
私が貴様らに忠告や助言をしてきたのは
全てルリアに
無事、旅を完遂させるためだ……
Korean:
내가 너희들에게 충고나 조언을 해 온 것은
모두 루리아로 하여금
무사, 여행을 완수하게 하기 위해서이다……

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
私はルリアさえ生き残っていれば、
それでいいのだ……

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
つまり、
旅を共にする者は、
貴様らでなくともよいのだぞ……！！
Korean:
즉,
여행을 함께 하는 자는,
네 놈들이 아니어도 좋다……!!

Name: 마물
Origin: グオオォォッ！！

Name: 라캄
Origin:
チッ……！
魔物をけしかけてきやがったか……！
さっさと片付けるぞ！ [ジータ]！
魔物と戦っている間に[ジータ]一行は黒騎士を見失ってしまう。しかし、オルキスの気持ちを無視することは出来ないと決意するルリアに皆が賛成し、一行は改めて黒騎士とオルキスを探し始める。
Korean: 마물과 싸우는 사이에[지ー타]일행은 검은 기사를 잃고 만다. 그러나 오르 키스의 기분을 무시할 수 없다고 결심했던 루리아에 모두가 찬성하다 일행은 다시 쿠로키시와 에후드 키스를 찾아 나선다.

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
くっ……
魔物と戦っている間に、
黒騎士を見失ってしまったようだな……
Korean:
이야……
마물과 싸우는 동안
검은 기사를 잃어 버린 것 같구나...

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
あいつの思惑通りってわけかい……
面白くねぇなぁ、おい。
Korean:
저 녀석의 뜻대로 건가?...
재미 없네, 야.

Name: 로제타
Origin:
最初からアイツの目的は
オルキスちゃんを連れて、
ここを去ることだったんだもの……
Korean:
처음부터 그 녀석의 목적은
오른 키스 너를 데리고
이곳을 떠나기였던 걸...

Name: 로제타
Origin:
魔物相手に熱くなってた時点で、
勝負は決してたってわけね。
Korean:
마물 상대로 열띤 된 시점에서,
승부는 결코 되겠네요.

Name: 비이
Origin:
くそー……
なぁ、どうする？
ルリア、[ジータ]
オルキスを探そう
諦めきれるはずがない

Name: 비이
Origin: やれやれ、諦めの悪い奴だな……

Name: 비이
Origin:
ま、オイラも
ここで引き下がる気なんか
さらさらないけどなっ！
Korean:
뭐, 나도
여기서 물러설 마음 따위
전혀 없지만서도..!

Name: 비이
Origin:
だよなっ！
[ジータ]なら、
そう言うって信じてたぜ！

Name: 루리아
Origin:
オルキスちゃんは……
私達ともっと一緒に居たいって、
そう、言ってくれました……
Korean:
오르 키스 너는.....
우리와 더 함께 있겠다고
그렇게 말하고 주었습니다...

Name: 루리아
Origin:
その気持ちを無視するなんて、
私、出来ないですっ！！

Name: 루리아
Origin:
行きましょう！ [ジータ]！
オルキスちゃんとこのままお別れなんて
ぜーったいに嫌ですっ！
Korean:
갑시다![지ー타]!
오른 키스랑 이대로 헤어지다니
자-. 도미로 싫어요!

Origin:
ルリアの言葉に、
全員が賛成の意を示す。
Korean:
루리아의 말에
모두가 찬성의 뜻을 나타낸다.

Origin:
消えた少女と黒騎士を追い、
[ジータ]達は、
深き森を駆ける。
Korean:
사라진 소녀와 검은 기사를 쫓아
[지ー타]들은
깊은 숲을 달리다.

Origin: Orchis smells a familiar scent in the forest. [Djeeta] and the others decide to follow it in hopes that it may lead them to the Black Knight.

Name: Orchis
Origin: Sniff... Sniff...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Something wrong, Orchis?

Name: Orchis
Origin: I... smell something.

Name: Rackam
Origin: You do? Well, we are in a forest. Flowers and trees as far as the eye can see, and most of them are fragrant.

Name: Orchis
Origin: That's not what I'm smelling. How can I put it? It's a... familiar smell.

Name: Io
Origin: A familiar smell, huh?

Name: Io
Origin: Hey! You think that means the Black Knight is somewhere around here?

Name: Katalina
Origin: It's possible. Where's this scent coming from, Orchis?

Name: Orchis
Origin: Over there...

Name: Lyria
Origin: This might lead us to the Black Knight! Let's check it out, [Djeeta]!
The scent leads [Djeeta] and the others to ancient ruins. They learn the scent doesn't belong to the Black Knight, but rather to a golem lying in wait.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Are these... some kind of ruins? They look downright ancient.

Name: Io
Origin: The Black Knight's supposed to be here? What could she be doing in a place like this?

Name: Orchis
Origin: What are you saying? Apollo isn't here. At least... I don't think she is.

Name: Io
Origin: Apollo? Who or what is Apollo?

Name: Eugen
Origin: So the Black Knight's not here? Guess that means Orchis's nose has let us down.

Name: Orchis
Origin: It's the same smell as my own. I don't remember much about it, but it's familiar... and it's coming from over there.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: A golem! What's it doing in a place like this?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: They're supposed to be used for guarding treasure and stuff!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Golems protect more than gold and silver, you know...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Well that thing doesn't look like it's here to welcome us with open arms...

Name: Katalina
Origin: So we don't have a choice here, [Djeeta]. We have to fight!
With no clues to the Black Knight's whereabouts, [Djeeta] and the others decide to search the ruins.

Name: Orchis
Origin: I'm sorry. That scent seemed familiar, but following it got you into trouble...

Name: Katalina
Origin: No need to apologize. We're the ones who decided to follow it, after all.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Exactly! And that golem didn't have a chance against us anyway!

Name: Rackam
Origin: What kind of place is this though? I mean... why does a golem need to keep watch over it?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Based on the remains, it looks like this place used to be an ordinary chapel.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Is it possible the golem and these ruins aren't necessarily related?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: What if a mage happened upon this place, chose to hide treasure here, and created a golem to guard it?

Name: Io
Origin: Hidden treasure? I like the sound of that!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: And it's gotta be finders keepers! Let's take a look around, [Djeeta]!

Name: Io
Origin: Ah! Hey! Wait up!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Although I highly doubt a mage would hide their treasure in a place like this...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Let's just take a look around for now. Orchis and Lyria might find something that connects them to this place.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah! Let's go, Orchis!

Name: Orchis
Origin: Okay. You should come with us, [Djeeta]...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Sounds good to me! We can all search together!
[Djeeta] and the others search the ruins high and low, but find nothing of interest. They decide to set out again to find the Black Knight.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huff... And here I was all fired up about finding some treasure...

Name: Io
Origin: There's... Huff... Nothing here...

Name: Katalina
Origin: You two did your fair share of rushing around!

Name: Orchis
Origin: Lyria. Did you find anything?

Name: Lyria
Origin: No. Not a thing...

Name: Lyria
Origin: But to be honest, I don't really recognize the scent you were talking about either.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Then that may mean your powers aren't especially related.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Orchis could've just smelled something that reminded her of home.

Name: Eugen
Origin: Speaking of which, where are you from, Orchis? Lumacie?

Name: Orchis
Origin: I don't know. My earliest memory is of being with Apollo.

Name: Orchis
Origin: But... this isn't my home. It just... doesn't feel like it.

Name: Eugen
Origin: In that case we could just stroll about the area until yer satisfied.

Name: Eugen
Origin: The Black Knight is bound to show up again if we ramble around the forest some more... and take care of some monsters along the way.
Lyria notices that Orchis has disappeared. Believing her to be lost, [Djeeta] and the crew begin to search for her.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Huh? Hey, [Djeeta]... have you seen Orchis?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hm? You think she might've gotten lost?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Maybe... She was here just a second ago.

Name: Io
Origin: She's gotten herself lost already? Might as well get her a babysitter!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Didn't you get lost just a second ago?

Name: Io
Origin: Wh-whatever! I don't wanna hear it! Let's just find her—and quick!
With Orchis still missing, [Djeeta] and the crew begin to worry. Rosetta reveals that she may know something about Vyrn's past, but quickly changes the subject when monsters appear.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hm... I don't see Orchis anywhere.

Name: Katalina
Origin: This is certainly worrisome. I hope no monsters got to her.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: She seemed strong enough to handle herself, but I don't like the idea of her being out here alone.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: How about we cook up somethin' tasty? The smells might lure her out!

Name: Io
Origin: I'm not sure about that, Vyrn. She's not a lizard like you...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I'm not a lizard!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: You aren't?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Oh, c'mon! Don't act so surprised!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: With these awesome wings and fearsome claws, does anything about me scream lizard to you?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Round wings and little claws... They're kind of adorable, Vyrn.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey! Don't call me cute!

Name: Rosetta
Origin:
Ah, you're right! You're not a lizard...
And you never were...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Duh! I've never been a lizard! I was born like this.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wait, what do you mean never were? Did we meet before in the past or something?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: P-perhaps... Who knows? And what would it matter?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: You have more important things to concern yourself with. Like these monsters! Ready yourself, [Djeeta].

Name: Rosetta
Origin: If we get walloped by monsters here, Orchis will never let us live it down!
The crew searches the forest for Orchis, but the Black Knight finds her first. Orchis wishes to stay with [Djeeta] and the crew, but the Black Knight takes her away. The crew decides to pursue them.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Orchis! Where are you?

Name: Eugen
Origin: No sign of her after all this searching... And it's startin' to get dangerous around here too.

Name: Eugen
Origin: Hopefully she made it back to Siero's on her own.
You're certainly optimistic.

Name: Rackam
Origin: The Black Knight!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Orchis! So you were with the Black Knight all along?

Name: Lyria
Origin: What's wrong, Orchis?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Just what were you trying to pull, Rosetta?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: I didn't mean anything by it. I just took a liking to the girl. Nothing more.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Such foolishness... But so be it. I have her back now, so I'll overlook your transgressions... this time.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Is that right? Then I'll try to be more careful in the future, I guess.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Tch... We're leaving.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: What's going on with you? Out with it.

Name: Orchis
Origin: I... I want to stay with Lyria and the others. For just a little longer...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Is this what you were after, Rosetta? With all your troublesome meddling?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Perhaps... Who knows?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hold on a second, Black Knight! Are you gonna pretend like we're not standing right here?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You told us to come to Lumacie, but all we've found is trees and more trees!

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Fool... Is that all you can see around you?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Come, little doll. We're done here.

Name: Orchis
Origin: Ah! No! Lyria!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Orchis!
The Black Knight takes Orchis by the hand and in the next moment, they're gone.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Orchis...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: It's not too late, [Djeeta]! After 'em! We can still save her!

Name: Katalina
Origin: They came by airship, which means they can't have left Lumacie just yet. Let's find them, [Djeeta]!
The crew catches up to the Black Knight and Orchis. The Black Knight says that she only has use for Lyria before setting monsters on the rest of the crew.

Name: Io
Origin: Found you, Black Knight! You're making Orchis upset! Let her go!

Name: Orchis
Origin: Io...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: You're a stubborn bunch... Who are you to tell me what I can do with my property?

Name: Io
Origin: Property? Orchis is our friend!

Name: Io
Origin: Look at her... She's about to cry. You think we're going to stand here and do nothing?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Attagirl, Io! You tell her!

Name: Rackam
Origin: So there you have it. We're not letting you outta here without a fight.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Oh, how wonderfully naive.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Huh? Excuse me?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: All of the help and advice I've given you until now was for ensuring Lyria's safe journey.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: As long as Lyria is alive, then little else matters.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Or to put it another way... her traveling companions can be easily replaced!

Name: Monster
Origin: Groooar!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Tch! She's siccing monsters on us! We gotta take them out, [Djeeta]!
As the crew battles the monsters, the Black Knight and Orchis slip away. But the crew is determined to be reunited with Orchis and plunges deeper into the forest in search of the two.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Looks like those two got away while we were fighting the monsters.

Name: Eugen
Origin: It's exactly what she was aiming for. What a way for things to turn out, eh?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: She planned to take Orchis and get out of here from the beginning.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: We lost the fight the minute those monsters showed up.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Good grief... So what do we do now guys?
We have to find Orchis.
You think I'd give up?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You really hate giving up, huh?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I mean, I'm not ready to give up either, if that's what you're wondering!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Exactly! I knew that's what you'd say, [Djeeta]!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Orchis said... she wanted to stay with us for just a little longer...

Name: Lyria
Origin: I can't just ignore that!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Let's go, [Djeeta]! I refuse to let Orchis be taken away from us forever!
Lyria's words are met with overwhelming approval from the crew.
They plunge deeper into the forest in their pursuit of Orchis and the Black Knight.
